thread.title: Eagles To Get $2,000 Winning Bonus Vs Burkina Faso
thread.title_full: Eagles To Get $2,000 Winning Bonus Vs Burkina Faso

author: Nnamdi Ezekute
title: Eagles To Get $2,000 Winning Bonus Vs Burkina Faso
text:
Headlines / Eagles To Get $2,000 Winning Bonus Vs Burkina Faso Eagles To Get $2,000 Winning Bonus Vs Burkina Faso Headlines , News Update 
By Adeboye Amosu in Ouagadougou: 
Each member of the home-based Super Eagles side will get $2,000 bonus should they beat the Stallions of Burkina Faso on Sunday and secure qualification for the African Nations Championship in Rwanda, reports Completesportsnigeria.com. 
The Eagles players were paid the same amount after edging out the West Africans 2-0 in the first leg match played at the Adokiye Amiesimaka Stadium, Port Harcourt a week ago. 
The Super Eagles who failed to qualify for the first two editions of the CHAN, won bronze medal at the last edition hosted by South Africa. 
The competition is reserved for senior players plying their trade in their country’s domestic league. 
Rwanda will host the next edition from January 16 – February 7, 2016.
